title: Telephone etiquette
brief_description: Telephone etiquette is vitally important in ensuring effective information flow. This short instructional video covers the main points in telephone etiquette, including identification of the caller/receiver of the call; politeness; using answering machines; tact and discretion and how to deal with difficult customers.
